Their exchange, referencing their successful Kolkata Knight Riders partnership, highlighted their bond. He also shared warm replies with cricketers Suresh Raina, Rinku Singh, and Harbhajan Singh, showcasing his signature humor and warmth.

title: Panjab University shows major upswing, Chandigarh University tops India’s private institutions
Deposit Rs 27.06 cr with SEBI to travel to UAE: Spl court to Ketan Parekh
More power for Asim Munir? Pakistan plans amendment; revises military command
description: Pakistan's government plans to introduce the 27th Constitutional Amendment, including changes to the command of the armed forces and Article 243. Deputy Prime Minister Ishaq Dar confirmed the amendment will be tabled soon, aiming to strengthen the military's role. The proposal also includes establishing a constitutional court and altering resource distribution.

title: Jemimah Rodrigues’ real victory is beyond the cricket field
‘I was a workhorse…’: Priyanka Chopra on how exhaustion at work is glorified and why it’s important to strike a balance
European Union welcomes suspension of China’s rare earth controls
‘Ready for any kind of polls,’ Tripura CM Saha says after Supreme Court denies more time to hold TTAADC village committee elections
Air traffic congestion: Flight operations impacted in Delhi; IndiGo issues advisory
description: Passengers faced significant flight delays in Delhi on Tuesday due to severe air traffic congestion. IndiGo issued an advisory acknowledging extended wait times on the ground and onboard, apologising for the inconvenience. The airline's teams are working to minimise disruptions and ensure passenger comfort, urging travelers to check for real-time updates.

title: ‘Any Jewish person that votes for Mamdani is stupid’: Trump says as voting gets underway in New York
Chandigarh Police arrests two from Rajasthan for ‘defrauding’ woman of Rs 15 lakh in ‘digital arrest’ scam
Pakistan's Haris Rauf, once hammered by Virat Kohli, banned by ICC after Asia Cup controversy
description: Pakistan's Haris Rauf faces a two-match ODI ban against South Africa for breaching the ICC Code of Conduct during the Asia Cup final against India. This follows previous demerit points, leading to his suspension. Other players, including India's Suryakumar Yadav and Jasprit Bumrah, also received sanctions for various code of conduct violations.

title: After backlash over Masti 4 trailer, Milap Zaveri defends sex comedy: ‘Women have a very strong role and POV’

Upheaval seen in neighbouring countries ‘can never happen in India’: Kiren Rijiju
'Chhath, Halloween & jungle raj': Bihar phase 1 campaign blitz ends — a quick recap
description: Campaigning for Bihar's first phase, covering 121 seats, concluded Tuesday. Top leaders from NDA and INDIA bloc made final pitches. Key issues included Nitish Kumar's appeal, a worker's killing sparking a storm, a JD(U) candidate's arrest, and Chhath Puja politics. "Jungle Raj" echoes and efforts to woo women voters dominated the final day.

title: ‘He is God’: Chinni Prakash recalls Salman Khan offered him work when he was jobless, says ‘Everybody can’t have a heart like him’
BJP wins 75% seats uncontested in Dadra, Daman local polls; Cong moves Bombay HC over ‘conspiracy’
Trump gushes over Taylor Swift as Travis Kelce stays quiet after Chiefs absence
description: Taylor Swift sparks political and NFL buzz as Donald Trump flips from “I HATE TAYLOR SWIFT” to calling her a “terrific person,” while the White House uses her song in a TikTok. Fans question her absence from the Kansas City Chiefs' game and Travis Kelce stays quiet as online speculation grows around the couple and the moment.

title: Watch: China’s astronauts grill chicken, steak in space — why it matters
description: China's space program has achieved a milestone with astronauts on Shenzhou-20 and Shenzhou-21 missions using a new space oven to barbecue chicken wings and cook steak. This advanced, smokeless oven significantly reduces cooking time compared to previous international experiments, enhancing astronaut living conditions and morale on long-duration missions.

title: Bandra land to be leased to Tirupati temple board for 30 yrs at Re 1 per year

Bollywood villain, who acted alongside Amitabh Bachchan and Govinda, married five times; battled depression, and died in isolation
Asia Cup controversy: ICC drops the hammer! Full list of players punished and warned
description: Cricket's governing body has handed out penalties to Indian and Pakistani players following contentious moments in the Asia Cup 2025. Suryakumar Yadav and Haris Rauf faced fines and demerit points for bringing the game into disrepute. Rauf's repeated offenses led to a two-match suspension, while Jasprit Bumrah received a warning.

'Highway man always high': Congress mocks Nitin Gadkari over Bihar poll promises
description: The Congress on Tuesday criticised Union minister Nitin Gadkari's repeated road construction promises in Bihar, labeling him the "highway man is always high."  Pawan Khera shared a video highlighting Nitin Gadkari's past and present assurances of "world-class" roads, drawing a jibe from Kerala Congress calling him the "new jumla king."

title: Happy Guru Nanak Jayanti: 50 Gurpurab wishes, messages, quotes & images
description: Guru Nanak Jayanti, also known as Gurpurab, celebrates the birth of Sikhism's founder, Guru Nanak Dev Ji. Celebrations include continuous scripture recitations, processions, and community meals, emphasizing equality and selfless service. The festival falls on Kartik Purnima, this year on November 5, 2025, and followers share wishes and quotes reflecting his teachings.

Musk vs Altman: OpenAI’s ex chief scientist testifies in court; reveals ‘6-day story’
description: New details reveal OpenAI's CEO Sam Altman's brief ousting stemmed from deep internal mistrust and months of growing tension. Co-founder Ilya Sutskever planned the move for over a year, citing a "pattern of lying" and undermining executives. An employee revolt swiftly reinstated Altman, solidifying his control over the AI giant.

Cleared all police tests but lost job before joining; man wins case in HC
description: A man named Rawal, selected for a Constable job, lost his chance due to judicial custody and a missed 30-day joining deadline. The Punjab and Haryana High Court reinstated his appointment, ruling that rigid adherence to non-statutory instructions shouldn't deny a deserving candidate a job after clearing a tough selection process.

Watch: Coach collapses mid-match, dies; players break down in heartbreaking scenes
description: Radnicki 1923 head coach Mladen Zizovic tragically passed away at 44 after collapsing during a Serbian SuperLiga match. The game was halted, and despite medical attention, Zizovic died at a nearby hospital. The match was later abandoned as players and staff reacted with profound grief. Zizovic was 44 at the time of his death.

Jeff Bezos’ ex-wife’s gift: MacKenzie Scott makes large donation; focus on education
description: MacKenzie Scott has donated $80 million to Howard University, one of the largest single gifts in its history, to support general operations and its College of Medicine. This significant contribution arrives as the university faces delays in federal funding due to a government shutdown. The donation aligns with Scott's ongoing philanthropic focus on diversity, equity, and inclusion initiatives.

title: Chhattisgarh train accident: Toll reaches 8; compensation of 10 lakh announced
Diabetes-friendly grains that help reverse blood sugar and support weight loss
description: Managing blood sugar and weight is crucial for diabetics. Dr. Pramod Tripathi, a Pune physician, recommends ten low-GI grains. These include barley, foxtail millet, brown top millet, little millet, kodo millet, banyad millet, khapli wheat, amaranth, buckwheat, and quinoa. Incorporating these grains into daily meals supports stable glucose levels and promotes weight management.

title: Lakers legend praises Bronny James after strong game vs Trail Blazers
description: Bronny James showcased a standout performance for the Los Angeles Lakers against the Portland Trail Blazers, contributing five points and six assists. Lakers legend James Worthy lauded the young guard's game, calling it potentially his best yet. Coach JJ Redick also praised Bronny's defensive intensity and physicality, highlighting his significant contributions in a crucial fourth-quarter stretch.

title: Big AI freebie: ChatGPT Go now free for 12 months in India; how to claim the offer
description: OpenAI is offering ChatGPT Go free for 12 months to users in India starting November 4, 2025. Eligible users include new sign-ups, free-tier users, and existing ChatGPT Go subscribers with accounts in good standing. The promotion provides access to GPT-5, advanced image generation, file uploads, data analysis tools, and custom GPTs at no cost. Users must add a payment method to redeem but won't be charged during the promotional period. This limited-time offer can be redeemed via web, Android, or iOS platforms.

title: Delhi gasps again: Cloud seeding, smog towers, odd-even — will any of it really clear the air?
description: Delhi grapples with its perennial pollution crisis, with various proposed solutions like cloud seeding, odd-even schemes, and smog towers facing scrutiny. Experts emphasize tackling major emission sources, including power, industry, transport, waste, and construction, advocating for cleaner fuels, vehicle electrification, and improved waste management.

title: Pakistan to deploy new submarines in 2026 — what it means for India’s naval strategy
description: Pakistan's naval strength is set to significantly increase next year with the induction of eight advanced Chinese-made Hangor-class submarines, featuring air-independent propulsion. This development poses a challenge to India's current conventional submarine capabilities, which are still awaiting their own building plans to commence. The move enhances Pakistan's maritime A2/AD posture.

title: Meghan Markle’s friend reveals why Prince Harry looked upset at Dodgers game
description: Meghan Markle enthusiastically celebrated the Dodgers' World Series victory, captured in a video by her friend Kelly McKee Zajfen. While Meghan was seen dancing and cheering, Prince Harry appeared more subdued, sparking fan speculation about his team loyalties. The couple, who moved to California in 2020, were previously seen at Game 4, both sporting Dodgers caps.

title: Charlise Springer breaks silence after Blue Jays' World Series heartbreak
description: The Toronto Blue Jays' World Series dream ended in heartbreak, but George Springer's wife, Charlise, offered a message of gratitude and pride. Her words highlighted the team's resilience and the lasting memories created, reminding fans that baseball's true value lies in connection and shared moments, not just wins. The team vows to 'run it back' next season.

title: Brittany Mahomes slams “disgusting” Bills fan stunt ahead of Chiefs vs Bills
description: Ahead of the Chiefs-Bills game, a past incident involving Brittany Mahomes and a fan display in Buffalo has resurfaced. She publicly condemned a disrespectful Kermit the Frog puppet mocking Patrick Mahomes, urging for basic decency. This reminder of respect underscores the intense rivalry, proving that even amidst fierce competition, human dignity remains paramount.
